info.title: Villa Booking System Rest APIs 3.0
info.description: This is an API for Villa Booking system mobile app.

tags.name: villas (host)
tags.description:
#add Villa
>
> Host => Id of host
>
> is featured => if villa is paid to be featured
>
#Status
> 0 for needs approval
> 
> 1 for approved
>
> 2 for pennalized 
>
> 3 for banned 
>
> 4 for deletion bin

post.description:
#usertype
>
>0 => guest
>
>1 => host
>
>2 => admin
>
#login_method
>
* 0 for phone,
>
* 1 for google,
>
* 2 for facebook,
>
* 3 for email

#Verified
> true => if number , email ,google or facebook verified
